rule: can_perform(S, R, 'SLI:Monitor-VR-Info') :- Subject(S), Resource(R), (resource_type(R, 'http://geysers.eu/upperlicl/resource/resource-type/VR-State-Info'); resource_type(R, 'http://geysers.eu/upperlicl/resource/resource-type/VR-Power-Info'); resource_type(R, 'http://geysers.eu/upperlicl/resource/resource-type/VR-Status-Info')).
